title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White ground with large serpentine branch from which spring sprays of realistically drawn flowers, acorns and foliage, brocaded in polychrome silks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1750–1800. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen. 1923-7-42.
